Accommodation

List of options

  • NTU Dormitory
  • Nanyang Executive Center (NEC)
  • Genting Hotel Jurong



    • NTU Dormitory

    Types: Standard Student Dormitory

  • WiFi Internet connection is available in all rooms and is free of charge
  • Aircondition

    • Booking via Email: umap_2018_dorm_application@outlook.com

    Address: 50 Nanyang Crescent, Singapore 637598

    Distance to conference venue (LT2A, 65 Nanyang Drive):

  • 10 minutes by free campus bus or
  • 20 minutes’ walk

    • Reservation Deadline: May 25th, 2018

    Rates for July 7th - 12th in total (no extra days allowed):

  • Twin-Sharing rooms for students S$150, and for non-students S$225
  • Single rooms for students S$190, and for non-students S$290

    • Check-in time: 8:00 am - 10:00 pm

    Payment: paying by cash




    Nanyang Executive Center (NEC)

    Types: In campus best hotel

  • Free WiFi
  • Breakfast included

    • Website: http://www.ntu.edu.sg/nec/Pages/default.aspx

    Booking via Email: nec-rsvn@ntu.edu.sg

    Address: 60 Nanyang View, Singapore 639673

    Location: http://maps.ntu.edu.sg/maps#q:nanyang%20executive%20centre%20%28nec%29

    Distance to conference venue (LT2A, 65 Nanyang Drive):

  • 6 minutes by taxi (Uber and Grab are available in campus)
  • 13 minutes by walk + 13 minutes by shuttle bus
  • Around 25 minutes by walk
  • We will arrange volunteers to guide you to the conference venue

    • Reservation Deadline: June 8th, 2018

    Rates:

  • Single Room 160SGD + 17% tax
  • Double Room 180SGD + 17% tax

    • Payment: Cash or Credit/Debit Card – Visa, MasterCard

    Deposit: NEC requires the client to place a deposit equivalent to 50% of the total amount of charges, inclusive of Service Charge and Goods and Services Tax to guarantee the booking. This deposit is non-refundable and non-transferable and will be credited towards the total charges.

    Cancellation policy:

    Cancellation Timeline Cancellation Charge
    2 months or less before the event Deposit forfeited or 50% of the total expenses
    7 working days or less before the event 100% of the total expenses
    Any time during the event period 100% of the total expenses




    Genting Hotel Jurong

    Types: 3-star hotel

  • Free WiFi
  • Breakfast included

    • Website: https://www.rwsentosa.com/en

    Booking via Email: callcentre.mice@rwsentosa.com (Please provide conference name when booking for discount)

    Address: 2 Town Hall Link, 608516

    Location:


    Distance to conference venue (LT2A, 65 Nanyang Drive):

  • 14 minutes by taxi (Uber and Grab are available in Singapore)
  • 10 minutes by walk + 9 minutes by mrt + 10 minutes bus

    • Reservation Deadline: June 8th, 2018

    Rates:

  • Superior Room (18sqm) 175SGD + 15% tax
  • Deluxe Room (27sqm) 210SGD + 15% tax

    • Payment: Cash or Credit/Debit Card – Visa, MasterCard
